property.label: Driver supports indexes
property.description: Driver supports table indexes

property.label: Driver supports stored code
property.description: Whether this driver supports stored code (procedures, functions, packages, etc)

property.label: Driver supports references
property.description: Driver supports table references (foreign keys)

property.label: Driver supports SELECT count(*) clause
property.description: Driver supports SELECT count(*) clause

property.label: Script delimiter
property.description: Literal for SQL queries separation in scripts

property.label: Script delimiter redefiner
property.description: SQL clause which redefines script delimiter value

property.label: Use script delimiter after query
property.description: Keep SQL script delimiter after each SQL query

property.label: Use script delimiter after SQL block
property.description: Keep SQL script delimiter after SQL script blocks (BEGIN/END)

property.label: Meta model type
property.description: Type of metadata reading model - standard or indexed

property.label: All Objects Pattern
property.description: SQL pattern for all metadata objects

property.label: Omit catalog(s)
property.description: Do not read and use catalog (aka database) information

property.label: Omit type cache
property.description: Do not use data types provided by driver

property.label: Shutdown parameter
property.description: Database shutdown URL parameter

property.label: Create database parameter
property.description: Database create URL parameter

property.label: Driver supports multiple results
property.description: Driver supports multiple results for a single query.

property.label: Driver supports result set limit
property.description: Driver supports multiple result set limit (max rows).

property.label: Driver supports structure cache
property.description: Driver supports structure cache reading. Enables schema columns, keys, etc.

property.label: Get active database
property.description: Query to obtain active database name

property.label: Set active database
property.description: Query to change active database

property.label: PING query
property.description: Query to check connection state

property.label: Dual table name
property.description: Name of dummy 'DUAL' table which is used for expressions evaluation

property.label: Active object type
property.description: Type of selectable object (schema, catalog)

property.label: Driver supports results scrolling
property.description: Driver supports resultset scrolling

property.label: Quote reserved words
property.description: Quote columns/table names if they conflicts with reserved SQL keywords

property.label: Drop column short syntax
property.description: Use 'ALTER TABLE DROP column-name' instead of standard syntax

property.label: Use legacy SQL dialect for DDL
property.description: Use legacy SQL dialect for DDL

property.label: Timestamp format
property.description: Format pattern for timestamp columns

property.label: Date format
property.description: Format pattern for date columns

property.label: Time format
property.description: Format pattern for time columns

driver.label: PostgreSQL (Old)
driver.description: PostgreSQL standard JDBC driver. Replaced by PostgreSQL extension driver.

driver.label: PostgreSQL (Generic)
driver.description: PostgreSQL JDBC driver. Can be used for old PostgreSQL server versions (before 8.x).

fileSource.name: DB2 10.5 GA drivers
fileSource.instruction: Download JDBC (JCC) client driver. Extract downloaded archive and copy db2jcc4.jar in some directory. Then add db2jcc4.jar as a library in DBeaver driver editor dialog.

driver.label: DB2 LUW 8.x
driver.description: DB2 LUW driver for older DB2 versions (8.x)

fileSource.name: DB2 drivers
fileSource.instruction: Download JDBC (JCC) client driver. Extract downloaded archive and copy db2jcc4.jar in some directory. Then add db2jcc4.jar as a library in DBeaver driver editor dialog.

driver.label: DB2 z/OS
driver.note: In order to connect to z/OS DB2 instance you have to install license file 'db2jcc_license_cisuz.jar'. Edit driver settings and and license file as a library.

driver.label: Microsoft Driver
driver.description: Microsoft JDBC Driver for SQL Server

driver.label: MaxDB
driver.description: SAP MaxDB - The SAP Database System

parameter.name: query-get-active-db
parameter.value: SELECT ODB_DBName FROM SysMaster:informix.SysOpenDB WHERE ODB_IsCurrent = 'Y' AND ODB_SessionID = DBINFO('sessionid')

driver.label: SQLite
driver.description: SQLite JDBC driver by Taro L. Saito (extension of Zentus driver)

driver.label: Apache Phoenix
driver.description: Driver for Apache Phoenix HBase Database

driver.label: CSV/DBF
driver.description: CsvJdbc driver for CSV and DBF files
